alert.note: Alert for Hughes (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 10:46AM MDT until September 07 at 11:30AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hughes County in central South Dakota... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1146 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rousseau, or 11 miles south of Blunt, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Canning around 1150 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
